gsheader1: Welcome to the Vehicle Guide App!
gsheader2: One - Stop Shop for Vehicle Information
getstart1: This app will streamline your experience in all aspects related to vehicles. You can browse through a variety of vehicles and models, along with their pricing details.
getstart2: With our comprehensive database, you can find information on any make or model of vehicle and pricing details.
getstart3: You can effortlessly exchange detailed information about vehicles, including specifications and pricing details. This user-friendly feature simplifies the process, making it convenient for users to access and share essential information about various vehicles quickly and efficiently.
otp2hdsubtext: 6 digit OTP sent to your number
